comments.body:
Is it not going to be translated to:
/event-exporter -sink-opts=-stackdriver-resource-model={{ exporter_sd_resource_model }} -endpoint={{ exporter_sd_endpoint }}

I think we need to change it to:
/event-exporter -sink-opts="-stackdriver-resource-model={{ exporter_sd_resource_model }} -endpoint={{ exporter_sd_endpoint }}"

I did some experiments by adding some `glog.Warning` after [this line](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/k8s-stackdriver/blob/master/event-exporter/sinks/stackdriver/sink_factory.go#L64).
The above command is translated to:
`./event-exporter "-sink-opts=-stackdriver-resource-model={{ exporter_sd_resource_model }} -endpoint={{ exporter_sd_endpoint }}"`
Which is equivalent to
`./event-exporter -sink-opts="-stackdriver-resource-model={{ exporter_sd_resource_model }} -endpoint={{ exporter_sd_endpoint }}"`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +55,59 @@        command:
        - /event-exporter
        - -sink-opts=-stackdriver-resource-model={{ exporter_sd_resource_model }} -endpoint={{ exporter_sd_endpoint }}
      # BEGIN_PROMETHEUS_TO_SD
      - name: prometheus-to-sd-exporter

comments.body: If you're bumping this to 2.1, bump Deployment version as well.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +48,52 @@      containers:
      - name: event-exporter
        image: k8s.gcr.io/event-exporter:v0.2.1
        command:
        - /event-exporter

comments.body: I'm not sure where this is even used.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +47,51 @@      # TODO: Add resources in 1.8

        image: gcr.io/google-containers/event-exporter:v0.1.0-r2
